title: Mahomes Making History, Fitzmagic in Tampa Bay, Vontae Davis Retiring, and Week 2 Takeaways | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 302)
description:
The Ringer’s Robert Mays and Kevin Clark link up to discuss Patrick Mahomes’s historic start to the season, Ryan Fitzpatrick’s on- and off-field swagger, and why kickers are struggling (23:45). Later, the guys throw their challenge flags for Week 2 (which include Vontae Davis retiring at halftime) before predicting this week’s headlines (48:30).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
